subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Flavia Pennetta routed 18-year-old CoCo Vandeweghe, 6-1, 6-2, on Sunday in San Diego to give Italy its second straight Fed Cup final victory over the United States.
snippet: Flavia Pennetta routed 18-year-old CoCo Vandeweghe, 6-1, 6-2, on Sunday in San Diego to give Italy its second straight Fed Cup final victory over the United States.
